text: Jisas bɨne okok poŋɨd man anɨb ak kelɨgɨl, Galili plopens nab okok ajolɨgup. Ajɨlɨg, bɨne okok kɨlop takaw agñɨ tep gɨnɨm agɨl, kɨmɨgel weyɨg mɨdɨlɨg, kɨlop agñolɨgup. Agñɨl agolɨgup, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop mɨmug nɨŋɨd, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop ñɨnɨgabal agolɨgup. Ñel, paklel kumɨl, ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agolɨgup.
